nodes.title: Rewrite automatic unit insertion
ctx.removeTokens(Seq[Token]) instead of ctx.removeTokens(Tokens)
nodes.bodyText: This should be a source compatible change since Tokens <: Seq[Token]

nodes.title: replaceSymbols that accepts a Seq
nodes.bodyText: It's fairly common to have a Seq to feed replaceSymbols and : _* is cumbersome to use.
